author: stylesen
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r36831 group which is fix for issue #3368.

author: stylesen
msg: (merge_file): If the file is scheduled for add and has an externals
definition, then mark it as unmodified, since this file was added
as a place holder to accept the incoming externals item.

author: gstein
msg: Bump the working copy format to 13. The primary change is the introduction
of a new WORK_QUEUE table, destined to replace the classic "loggy"
Note: this is a silent, automagic upgrade from f12 to f13. If you have a
working copy that is format 11 or older, then "svn upgrade" will be
Note: we were intending some schema changes to better handling conflicts,
but due to open questions, that has been postponed to an f14 bump.

author: gstein
msg: Isolate the "current format" into a function.
(get_current_format): new function to return the current wc format
(basic_upgrade, upgrade_1_5_body): use new func rather a magic number
